faqs.q: How many calories in sour patch kids per serving?
faqs.a: About 140 calories in a standard 40 g serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in sour patch?
faqs.a: One serving has 35 g of carbohydrates, all from sugars with no fiber.

faqs.q: Does sour patch kids have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: No protein or fat; it's nearly 100% carbs from sugars.

faqs.q: How much sugar is in sour patch kids?
faqs.a: 26 g of sugars per 40 g serving.

faqs.q: Are calories the same for all sour patch flavors?
faqs.a: Very similar across flavors, but check labels for exact minor variations.
